actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1122.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7051 to authorize appropriations for the international affairs functions of the Department of the Treasury for fiscal years 1981 and 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7051 (Department of the Treasury funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7051 to authorize appropriations for the international affairs functions of the Department of the Treasury for fiscal years 1981 and 1982, and for other purposes.
